title: The Angry Video Game Nerd
fullTitle: The Angry Video Game Nerd (TV Series 2004â€“ )

episodes.title: The Last Ninja (NES)
episodes.plot: The Nerd discovers a message he'd left himself back in 2006: to finish reviewing The Last Ninja, the absolute worst ninja game ever made.

episodes.title: Contra: How I Remember It
episodes.plot: The Nerd takes a sentimental look back at two of the most awesome games in the NES library: Contra and Super C.

episodes.title: Purr Pals (Wii)
episodes.plot: Remember the Nintendo Wii? Oh wait, it's still a thing. However, the Nerd has decided the time has come to talk about this innovative gaming system, as well as a game about pampering a cat.

episodes.title: Hudson Hawk (NES)
episodes.plot: Returning to the realm of movie based games, the Nerd looks at the NES adaptation of Hudson Hawk, and while it may be tedious, inane, and ridiculous, at least it's only three levels long.

episodes.title: Doom
episodes.plot: While waiting for his copy of Doom (1993) to load on his Commodore 64, the Nerd makes a deal with the Devil to play other console versions of Doom, ranging from good, bad, and downright ugly.

episodes.title: Garfield
episodes.plot: Nothing says Christmas like a world famous, lazy orange cat. The Nerd is serving up some yuletide laughs as he reviews horrible games based off Garfield that will make you hurl your lasagna.
